post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
I implemented uploading files using oreilly's multiparti filter classes already. This has been working perfect with Tomcat for the last 2 years, and seems *conditionally* OK with WebSphere 5.0 though Websphere has a problem of loosing request object's parameters in forwarded JSP. I spent quite a time to track down what happened with Webspere but this was not my question.
The question is not how to implement uploading files but how to set up "virtual path" concept that maps specific URL into physical file system's directoy, which is not located within the application's deployment directory.
post.title: Thank you but..
